sources.title: A Real American Hero (1978)
sources.description: When two boys are killed and two girls are blinded for life in a tragic accident, Buford Pusser, the town sheriff, is determined to get revenge. Though he must bend the law, Pusser is resolved to get the bootleg booze and dope king of the county who provided the poisoned moonshine that caused the accident. Based on the real-life folk hero whose career inspired the Walking Tall movies. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-real-american-hero-1978/

sources.description:
Tennessee Sheriff Buford Pusser attempts to stop a moonshiner whose bad liquor has blinded several teens.
 
Original title: A Real American Hero (1978) 

Director: Lou Antonio
Writers: Mort Briskin, Samuel A. Peeples
Stars: Brian Dennehy, Forrest Tucker, Brian Kerwin 
Genres: Crime, Drama, TV Movie

00:00  Sheriff Buford T. Justice chases down a van of drunk teenagers after a deadly accident caused by poisoned liquor.
09:29  Sheriff Pusser faces backlash after raiding a bootlegging operation and causing harm to innocent people.
18:49  Sheriff Buford Pusser's actions are criticized in court and warned to respect the law.
25:00  Buford Pusser discusses old laws with Lloyd, and Lloyd warns Buford about taking the law into his own hands.
32:31  The conversation revolves around a man named Deke Miller who has caused trouble for Mr. Junker and his chickens, and the sheriff is asked to take action.
38:29  Buford plans to use the law to take down Danny Boy Mitchell.
46:57  Sheriff Pusser enforces obsolete laws in Selmer, Tennessee, causing chaos and anger among the locals.
55:39  Buford Pusser discusses his efforts to bring a man to justice and asks for the community's trust.
1:02:54  Buford gets into a fight with Mitchell and decides to go to a dance with Carrie
1:11:36  Buford and Carrie attend a barn dance, where Carrie saves a choking girl and Buford receives a call about a shooting at the lumber yard.
1:18:42  Buford Pusser and his team engage in a shootout with Danny Boy and his gang, resulting in Danny's death and Debbie's betrayal.

sources.title: A Real American Hero 1978
sources.description: A sheriff's authority is challenged by a woman and a friend who use the blue laws to their advantage. He also can bring to bear some old laws.

metadata.Plot: Bufford Pusser is the Sheriff of a Tennessee County who must go against a former friend, and a group of women who use an old blue law to segregate a recently freed prostitute. To fight them he uses other old laws that aren't relevant today. Is he ready to face opposition, or will there be any?
metadata.Actors: Brian Dennehy, Forrest Tucker, Brian Kerwin
